languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает, но затем приглашающим жестом предлагает расположиться рядом.{/n} "На Крударахе говорили, в тишине можно услышать биение сердца — музыку души, что рвется наружу. Раздели же со мной эту песнь без слов, {name}. Пусть она подарит покой нам обоим".

{n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat nearby.{/n} "We had a saying on Crudarach: in silence you can hear a heartbeat — the music of the soul trying to burst out. Please, share this wordless song with me, {name}. And may it bring peace to us both."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает, но затем приглашающим жестом предлагает расположиться рядом.{/n} "На Крударахе говорили, в тишине можно услышать биение сердца — музыку души, что рвется наружу. Раздели же со мной эту песнь без слов, {name}. Пусть она подарит покой нам обоим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat near herself.{/n} "There was a saying on Crudarach, that in silence, you can hear the heartbeat — the music of the soul that tries to burst out. Please, share this song with no words with me, {name}. And let it bring peace to us both."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特愣住了，随后向你做了个手势，邀请你在她身边坐下。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫有一句谚语：在寂静中聆听心跳，那是灵魂呼之欲出的歌唱。请与我一同分享这支无言的歌谣，{name}，愿它为我们带来心灵的宁静。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat nearby.{/n} "We had a saying on Crudarach: in silence you can hear a heartbeat — the music of the soul trying to burst out. Please, share this wordless song with me, {name}. And may it bring peace to us both."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特愣住了，随后向你做了个手势，邀请你在她身边坐下。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫有一句谚语：在寂静中聆听心跳，那是灵魂呼之欲出的歌唱。请与我一同分享这支无言的歌谣，{name}，愿它为我们带来心灵的宁静。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se queda muy quieta durante un instante, luego te hace un gesto para que tomes asiento junto a ella.{/n} «En Crudarach teníamos un dicho. "En el silencio se pueden oír los latidos; es la música del alma intentando salir". Por favor, comparte esta canción sin voz conmigo, {name}. Y que nos aporte solaz a {mf|ambos|ambas}».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat nearby.{/n} "We had a saying on Crudarach: in silence you can hear a heartbeat — the music of the soul trying to burst out. Please, share this wordless song with me, {name}. And may it bring peace to us both."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se queda muy quieta durante un instante, luego te hace un gesto para que tomes asiento junto a ella.{/n} «En Crudarach teníamos un dicho. "En el silencio se pueden oír los latidos; es la música del alma intentando salir". Por favor, comparte esta canción sin voz conmigo, {name}. Y que nos aporte solaz a {mf|ambos|ambas}».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se fige un instant, puis vous indique d'un geste de la main de vous asseoir à côté d'elle.{/n} « Sur Crudarach, nous avions un adage qui disait : "Dans le silence, on entend les battements du cœur, qui sont le chant d'une âme cherchant à s'élever." Je vous en prie, écoutons ensemble cette musique, {name}. Cela nous apportera peut-être la paix. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat nearby.{/n} "We had a saying on Crudarach: in silence you can hear a heartbeat — the music of the soul trying to burst out. Please, share this wordless song with me, {name}. And may it bring peace to us both."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se fige un instant, puis vous indique d'un geste de la main de vous asseoir à côté d'elle.{/n} « Sur Crudarach, nous avions un adage qui disait : "Dans le silence, on entend les battements du cœur, qui sont le chant d'une âme cherchant à s'élever." Je vous en prie, écoutons ensemble cette musique, {name}. Cela nous apportera peut-être la paix. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet erstarrt für eine Sekunde und bedeutet dir dann, dich in ihre Nähe zu setzen.{/n} "Wir hatten auf Crudarach eine Redensart: In der Stille hörst du jeden Herzschlag – die Musik der Seele, die ausbrechen will. Bitte teilt dieses wortlose Lied mit mir, {name}. Und möge es uns beiden Frieden bringen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat nearby.{/n} "We had a saying on Crudarach: in silence you can hear a heartbeat — the music of the soul trying to burst out. Please, share this wordless song with me, {name}. And may it bring peace to us both."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet erstarrt für eine Sekunde und bedeutet dir dann, dich in ihre Nähe zu setzen.{/n} "Wir hatten auf Crudarach eine Redensart: In der Stille hörst du jeden Herzschlag – die Musik der Seele, die ausbrechen will. Bitte teilt dieses wortlose Lied mit mir, {name}. Und möge es uns beiden Frieden bringen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは一瞬固まった後、近くに座るようにジェスチャーをする。{/n}「クルダラでは、静寂の中に鼓動が聞こえるということわざがあった。魂の音楽がはじけ出そうとしているのだ。この言葉のない歌を我とわかち合ってくれないか、{name}。それが我ら二人に平和をもたらしてくれるように祈ろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat nearby.{/n} "We had a saying on Crudarach: in silence you can hear a heartbeat — the music of the soul trying to burst out. Please, share this wordless song with me, {name}. And may it bring peace to us both."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは一瞬固まった後、近くに座るようにジェスチャーをする。{/n}「クルダラでは、静寂の中に鼓動が聞こえるということわざがあった。魂の音楽がはじけ出そうとしているのだ。この言葉のない歌を我とわかち合ってくれないか、{name}。それが我ら二人に平和をもたらしてくれるように祈ろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bir anlığına donup kalıyor ve ardından yanına oturmanı işaret ediyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ta bir söz vardır: Sessizlikte kalp atışları duyulur. O ses, dışarı fışkırmaya çalışan ruhun şarkısıdır. Bu sessiz şarkıyı benimle dinle {name}. İkimize de huzur getirsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes for a second, then gestures for you to take a seat nearby.{/n} "We had a saying on Crudarach: in silence you can hear a heartbeat — the music of the soul trying to burst out. Please, share this wordless song with me, {name}. And may it bring peace to us both."
